description:
For a young guy, Miles has experienced a lot.

He’s been cliff jumping and sky diving, and he’s swum with seals in the Galapagos Islands.

He recently got into yoga and admitted there is more than one reason he does it.

“It’s fun to stare at all the hot yoga instructors,” he said. “They have great asses!”

“What if it’s a guy teaching the class?”

“Even better!”

“So you are into guys?”

“Yes,” he said. “It’s been within the last two years... I guess I was just overly curious!”

He was very open about a crush he has on a friend of his... which turned into something more...

“It just kinda happened,” he said. “We both ditched our girlfriends one night...”

“How many times have you hooked up with this guy?”

“You could probably count the times on three hands... maybe four, who knows!”
title: Miles
